org.apache.karaf.features.internal.service

Class Deployer.DeploymentState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.karaf.features.internal.service.Deployer.DeploymentState
  • Enclosing class:
    Deployer

    public static class Deployer.DeploymentState
extends java.lang.Object

    Representation of the state of system from the point of view of installed bundles and available features

Shall be called with DownloadManager, Deployer.DeployCallback, Deployer.DeploymentState.
